title: Real-Time Chat App
description: Developed a real-time chat application with Socket.io, enabling instant messaging and online user status tracking.

title: Ecommerce
description: Developed an intuitive ecommerce website with admin panel using Next.js Used Stripe for seamless payment mode.

title: Draggable Todo list
description: This is a todo list but you can customize it as you want. You can create , drag tasks from todo to work in progress to done .

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: This is a tic tac toe game but not only that it keeps track of the moves and switches the control from one player to other.

title: Movie Streaming website
description: This is movie streaming website with really eyecatching ui . Here you can stream diffrent movies of all genre

title: Pig Game
description: The Pig Game is a fun and interactive game built with React.js, where players take turns rolling a die to accumulate points first to reach 100 wins.
